DOC.brief_title: Comparison Prophylactic Effect Between Acupuncture Acupressure Menstrual Migraine
DOC.detailed_description: First , female interested study appointment researcher decide eligibility accord inclusion exclusion criterion . If eligible , participant sign consent form . Then , participant meet inclusion criterion ask keep headache diary record date migraine attack , start end time point migraine attack , drug usage ( dose type ) , average migraine pain 10-point VAS , day menstruation , three-month period ( three menstrual cycle ) . The diary collect researcher end third month traditional Chinese medicine ( TCM ) pattern MM participant diagnose accord answer symptom related question . In addition , times/dates treatment schedule . Upon arrival exercise lab , Room 4115 inside Thames Hall Western University first treatment day ( eighth day estimate first day menstruation ) , participant ask sit relax 1-2 min . Then ask lie prone position receive correspond intervention acupuncturist . In verum acupuncture group , participant receive real needle insertion . Sterile needle ( 0.18 mm diameter 30 mm length , DONGBANG Needle , Korea ) use acupoints . The depth insertion vary 15 mm 20 mm depend exact location . An initial manual stimulation give insertion rotation method produce specific sensation describe `` de-qi '' TCM ( sensation perceive acupuncture receiver numbness , fullness , sometimes soreness around point . Then needle leave acupoint 20 min , manual rotation 4-8 Hz amplitude approximately 0.5-2 rotation ten-min interval maintain sensation `` de-qi '' . Primary acupoints use verum acupuncture group : LR3 ( Taichong ) , LI4 ( Hegu ) , SP6 ( Sanyinjiao ) , GB20 ( Fengchi ) . They select accord several previous relevant clinical study . Extra acupoints select base TCM pattern . If due qi stagnation , GB41 ( Zulinqi ) add . If due blood stasis , SP10 ( Xuehai ) add . If due Liver Kidney yin deficiency , KI3 ( Taixi ) add . If due Liver fire , LR2 ( Xingjian ) add . The exact localization acupoints describe textbook . All point apply bilaterally unless explicit reason describe detail . In acupressure group acupoints number session exactly verum acupuncture group . Acupressure apply correspond acupoints described acupuncture group . Finger pressure apply acupoint eight second follow two-seconds rest , repeat 3 min . The strength pressure depend individual participant 's sensation `` de-qi '' . Duration session 15 min . In control acupuncture group , number , duration , frequency session verum acupuncture group . Sterile needle ( 0.18 mm diameter 15 mm length , DONGBANG Needle , Korea ) use acupoints therapeutic effect either menstruation migraine , base acupuncture text book acupuncture research literature . The point choose : LR7 ( Xiguan ) , GB35 ( Yangjiao ) , LI12 ( Zhouliao ) , M-BW-1 ( Dingchuan ) . The depth needle insertion superficial 3 mm , without manual rotation , order minimize stimulation needle . All intervention perform acupuncturist licensed College Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioners Acupuncturists Ontario ( CTCMPAO ) . Before acupuncture treatment , appropriate infection control measure employ , different size single use , sterile , disposable needle appropriate package available . Participants suggest wear short T-shirts lab treatment . They assume prone position . The skin point swab 70 % ethyl alcohol , use outward rotary motion center point surround area lessen risk contamination . No treatment take alcohol dry . The acupuncturist wash hand immediately removal needle . On withdraw needle , sterile cotton ball use press skin insertion site . If blood drawn , light pressure apply clean swab . The second third treatment fifth third day estimate first day menstruation month . The whole process repeat total nine time three month treatment . Sample size calculate one relatively well design study . According study , migraine attack frequency month treatment verum acupuncture group 4.8 ± 3.8 time , sham acupuncture group 7.8 ± 3.7 time . Based power 0.8 detect significant difference ( α = .05 , two-sided ) , 32 participant require group , calculate R software Version 0.96.122 ( RStudio , Boston , MA ) . Allowing 20 % withdrawal rate , total 120 participant enrol 40 participant group . The analysis start 10 participant collect group . The statistical significance level set p = .05 , statistical test two-sided . Factorial analysis variance ( ANOVA ) use make comparison among three group . Tukey 's post hoc test use analyze outcome pair two group time point . Comparisons within group outcomes time point do use one-way ANOVA . All analysis perform use R software Version 0.96.122 .
DOC.criteria: 1. female age 18 40 ; 2. diagnosis pure menstrual migraine menstrually related migraine accord criterion International Classification Headache Disorders III beta version ; 3. regular menstrual period ; 4. repeat selfconsidered MM attack least half year ; 5. plan become pregnant change hormonal treatment study ; 6. voluntarily join study provide informed consent . 1. difficulty differentiate migraine type headache ; 2. primary headache tensiontype headache cluster headache , secondary headache ; 3. lack time and/or motivation participate ; 4. start use new kind migraine prophylactic drug last three month ; 5. serious cardiovascular , neurological , psychiatric disease accord selfreported medical history ; 6. severe bleed disorder anticoagulation accord medical history ; 7. cardiac pacemaker ; 8. metal allergy ; 9. severe needle phobia ; 10. pregnant lactating .
